name: Riya
wishText: May the god always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to my most gorgeous, smart, and best friend. Live your best life!...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now enjoy your day with me xd ;)
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
